algorithm_technique: Group visits by user, generate all 3-website visit patterns for each user, and count frequencies.
problem_summary_simple: Find the most frequent 3-website visit pattern across all users.
problem_summary_technical: Groups user visits, generates all 3-website combinations for each user, and counts pattern frequencies to find the lexicographically smallest highest-scoring pattern.
key_insights: The problem requires identifying sequences of website visits for each user, not just individual visits.
Generating all combinations of 3 websites for each user is necessary to cover all possible patterns.
A frequency map (Counter) is essential to tally the scores of different patterns.
Lexicographical comparison is needed to break ties when multiple patterns have the same highest score.
